jaod

Source: R/jaod-package.R
jaod-package.Rd

Client for the Directory of Open Access Journals (DOAJ) https://doaj.org/.

DOAJ Information

DOAJ is a (quoting) "community-curated list of open access journals and aims to be the starting point for all information searches for quality, peer reviewed open access material."

DOAJ API documentation can be found at https://doaj.org/api/v1/docs.

DOAJ API FAQ: https://doaj.org/faq#apikey

Package API

  • jaod_article() - Get an article by ID

  • jaod_article_search() - Search for articles

  • jaod_journal() - Get a journal by ID

  • jaod_journal_search() - Search for journals

Contents

  • DOAJ Information
  • Package API
